name: Cat Mafia Prototype
description:
Cat Mafia is a 2D shooter where you play as a cat who's in the mafia and needs to deliver milk while also defeating enemies. The game was made in 1 week for my Game Production II class, which is why some things are a bit off.

Instructions/Controls:

Deliver milk to your customers (in the houses) and shoot the enemies before they can attack you (on the ground).

  • Right Click - Shoot milk to customers
  • Left Click - Shoot rotten milk to enemies
  • A - Refill customer milk
  • D - Refill enemy rotten milk
